settings.NarratorActorHint: This actor with this document id takes on the role of the narrator. This means that the voice settings of this actor are used if either no actor has been selected with the /talk command or no voice settings have been made for that actor.
settings.AllowUsersHint: If enabled, users have access to the module.
settings.EnableSelectionContextMenu: Enable Context Menu On Selected Text
settings.EnableSelectionContextMenuHint: If enabled, a context menu will be presented in journal entries to read aloud the selected text parts. (Not compatible with the module "Narrator Tools"
settings.PostTextToChatHint: If enabled, the spoken text will be posted to the chat window (and possibly as a chat bubble on the actor's token)
settings.AutoInCharacterTalk: Automatically read aloud In-Character chat messages
settings.AutoInCharacterTalkHint: If enabled, chat messages sent In-Character with the /ic command will be automatically read aloud.

errors.noTokenSelected: At least one token has to be selected.
errors.noLinkedActor: At least one token with a linked actor has to be selected!
errors.notAllLinkedActors: Not all selected token are linked to actors. Voice settings will only assigned to the linked actors.
errors.noApiKey: The Elevenlabs api key has to be configured in the settings first.
errors.tokensAlreadyAdded: Some actors are already contained and not added again.
